name: Stick Warriors 2
description:
ALL NEW STICKMAN EXPERIENCE FOR FIGHTING PLAYERS
Follow the stick warrior’s trail in the pursuit of becoming a powerful stick warrior, with the new system of stickman fighting, evolving, combination of appearance and martial arts. These childhood legends now appear under stickman forms, are also equipped with new series of ultimate skills, such as dragon fist, power combo attacks and soul bomb. The stickman battle will be non-stop and intense, so the player who has the higher mental stability will earn a bigger opportunity to defeat the opponent!

ALL NEW WARRIORS AND LEGENDS TO SELECT
6 starting fighters are ready to be chosen. From there, you can train play them to reach higher level before collecting new faces. The childhood heroes are from different base of combats. While some legends use their ki rapidly to gather stick soul power and execute power balls as much as possible, others dominate the arena by fast moves, techniques and dodges. The rest should be under stickman ninja form. They have limited power, but their assassination skills will impress you immediately!
You can start from the chosen stickman fighters, or collect rewards and unlock more legendary stick warriors later. The more difficult character to unlock, the more powerful kame and stunning effects they have. Therefore, it is recommended to collect your rewards and choose your favorite legends carefully.

MORE STUNNING EFFECTS, MORE FUN!
Why not playing stickman with friends and defeat them? You can fight anytime, anywhere, especially while surrounded by a big crowd! Make sure to introduce the game to them and start the fighting battle together! The stick fighters have various forms, from their first training to the most intense battle-ready! Ultimate weapons and skills are based on dragon fights, real-life combat, which makes it more fun to play.

TRY DIFFERENT MODES TO DISCOVER THE GAME
We would like to challenge hardcore players by giving them more stickman intense matches to fight! Get to the Versus Mode, Challenge Mode and the nightmare Survival Mode, where all your actions do not belong to attack only. Try blocking the enemy, control the game by your mental attributes before making them pay!
Remember, stickman fighting makes it simple by its look, but difficult by the gameplay. Therefore, training before getting to real battle is also recommended. From those, you can collect stick fighters, gather your better team to deliver the real fight!
What will happen if you have outplayed warrior as the leader, followed by the legendary golden human, ended up with a flash stick ninja who could execute last deadly moves?

UNFORGETTABLE EXPERIENCE FROM INTENSE FIGHTS
Stickman Warriors 2 will be even better if you share with your friends, communicate about strategies and skills to earn higher experience at the higher challenge! Play now and enjoy the best from your childhood stickman warriors!
